lines.br: A maré tá cheia, cuidado menino
lines.en: The tide is high, be careful boy,

lines.br: Meu mestre falou pra ser um bom Capoeira
lines.en: My master said to be a good Capoeirista

lines.br: Tem que ir pra Bahia pedir a benção a Rainha do Mar
lines.en: You have to go to Bahia and ask the Queen of the Sea for her blessing

lines.br: Tem que ter fundamento, molejo e mandinga e saber vadiar
lines.en: You have to have foundation, flexibility, and mandinga, and know how to play
